A Life in Cameras
Part 2 - FED 4, Russian Rangefinder
FrasSmith
2019-11-13

Second of a series of posts dedicated to the many cameras that I have owned over the years. While some of the posts may focus on my thoughts the camera itself, for others, I hope to dig up some remote memories and anecdotes from the time when I owned it.

Writing this second article has taken a bit longer than expected. The problem is that—as I hope will become clear—this article and several future articles will touch on the same subject. It’s not a difficult subject, but I don’t want to start repeating myself without having something new to say.


#cameras , #photography , #gas , #fed , #rangefinder , #leicamount , #biographical
